resources.string: Please tap here to find out why.
Enter your Baby\'s Birthday in \n\'MM/DD/YYYY\' format \n(ex. 03/31/2016)
Your Baby\'s Name must be less than 20 characters. Please enter a shorter name.
Please enter your Baby\'s First Name.
Baby\'s birthday must be at least 1 day ago. Please try again.
There were no prompts for the baby\'s age. Please try again.
Number of Tips To Send Per Reminder
Could not save user try again
By providing your baby\'s birthday, Beginning with Babble can keep track of your child\'s age! This allows the app to send tips that are just right for your child!
By including your baby\'s first name, the app creates a unique profile for you and your child. This is a secure profile that no else but you can access!
The app uses your zip code to figure out when to send reminders based on your time zone. You can also change the times that tips are send under \"Settings\" < \"Reminder Setting.\"
Please Connect To The Internet To Continue
Please Check That The End Time Is After The Start Time
It is a good time to read to %1$s!.
There is updated Content for you to Download.
Come back tomorrow for more ways to talk, listen and connect with your baby!
New Tips Are Available To Download
By selecting your baby\'s gender, the app will be able to better personalize tips for you and your child!
Please wait while we download tips to your mobile device. Also please do NOT leave this screen as this will disrupt the download process. Thanks!
You and your child are ready to go. You will get your first tip shortly!
Remember, you can change the times tips are sent under “Settings.” Get ready to have some fun with your child
Click below to search our library for specific Tips.
You\'re doing great! Keep it up!
This is a big update with a lot of new tips and features and we need you to reenter your baby information. Thank you and enjoy.
You can select the appropriate age level for your child
